charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM BY A CONVICTED FELON (1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a term of 70 months on each of Count 1 thru 4 to be served concurrently; Supervised Release for a term of 36 months; Special Assessment in the sum of $400.00 (1)
